            int nit,
            java.lang.String foundationDate)
        Club's constructor. pre: The clubName, nit and foundationDate must be defined.
        pos: The values of clubName, nit and foundationDate are now defined in the club. the teams are initialized in null and the ArrayLists and each Matrix are initialized.
        Parameters:
        clubName. - Represents the name of the club.
        nit. - Represents the NIT of the club.
        foundationDate. - Represents the foundationDate of the club.

        public void fireEmployee(java.lang.String id)
        Searches an employee by its id and fires him. Also, removes him from the teams, etc. pre: The id must belong to an employee
        pos: The position in the ArrayList of the employee will be taken by the next employee.
        Parameters:
        id. - Represents the id of the employee to fire.

        pos: Creates a team and assigns it to whether teamA or teamB.
        Parameters:
        opt. - Represents whether the team to create is the A or B.

      • addEmployee

        public void addEmployee(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String id,
                        double salary,
                        java.lang.String state,
                        int yearsOfExperience,
                        int managerOfTeams,
                        int wonChampionships)
        Adds a new employee to the payroll. Employee that must be a Main Coach.
        pre: All the parameters must be defined.
        pos: A new employee of instance MainCoach is added to the payroll.
        Parameters:
        name. - Represents the name of the Main Coach.
        id. - Represents the id of the Main Coach.
        salary. - Represents the salary of the Main Coach.
        state. - Represents the state of the Main Coach.
        yearsOfExperience. - Represents the year of experience as a coach.
        managerOfTeams. - Represents how many teams does the coach manages.
        wonChampionships. - Represents the amount of won championships as a coach.

      • addEmployee

        public void addEmployee(java.lang.String name,

                        boolean wasPlayer,
                        java.lang.String expertise)

        pos: A new employee of instance Assistant is added to the payroll.

        id. - Represents the id of the Assistant.
        salary. - Represents the salary of the Assistant.
        state. - Represents the state of the Assistant.
        yearsOfExperience. - Represents the year of experience as a coach.
        wasPlayer. - Represents whether the assistant was a player in the past.
        expertise. - Represents the expertise of the assistant.

        public void addEmployee(java.lang.String name,

                        int shirtNumber,
                        int numberOfGoals,
                        double averageRating,
                        java.lang.String position)

        pre: All the parameters must be defined.
        pos: A new employee of instance Player is added to the payroll.
        Parameters:
        name. - Represents the name of the Player.
        id. - Represents the id of the Player.
        salary. - Represents the salary of the Player.
        state. - Represents the state of the Player.
        shirtNumber. - Represents the number of the player's shirt.
        numberOfGoals. - Represents the number of goals the player has made so far.
        averageRating. - Represents the average rating of the player.
        position. - Represents the position of the player.

      • updateEmployee

        public void updateEmployee(java.lang.String id,
                           int wonChamp,
                           int manager)
        Updates an employee of instance MainCoach, depending on the parameters.
        pre: The atribute to update must be greater or equal to 0
        pos: The selected atribute of the employee will be updated with the new value.
        Parameters:
        id. - Represents the id of the Main Coach.
        wonChamp. - Represents the number of won championships to update.
        manager. - Represents the number of teams managed by the main coach to update.

      • updateEmployee

        public void updateEmployee(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           double salary,
                           java.lang.String state)
        Updates any employee depending on the parameters.
        pre: The atribute to update must be whether different from null if it is an String, or different from 0 if it is a double.
        pos: The selected atribute of the employee will be updated with the new value.
        Parameters:
        id. - Represents the id of the Employee.
        name. - Represents the new name of the Employee.
        salary. - Represents the new salary of the employee.
        state. - Represents the new state of the employee.

      • updateEmployee

        public void updateEmployee(java.lang.String id,
                           int shirtNum,
                           double averageRating,
                           java.lang.String position)
        Updates an employee of instance Player depending on the parameters.
        pre: The atribute to update must be whether greater or equal to 0 if it is an int or a double or different from null if it is an String.
        pos: The selected atribute of the employee will be updated with the new value.
        Parameters:
        id. - Representes the id of the Player.
        shirtNum. - Represents the new number of the player's shirt.
        averageRating. - Represents the new average rating of the player.
        position. - Representes the new position of the player.
